MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH47 postcode area of Bathgate. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9am to repair a fault on our underground cable network on McKinnon Road and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9am on 27/11/2020.
